replies: You really are something - something dull.
Wow. You're a waste of space.
Do go on! But wait, let me leave first.
I don't really care about anything.
So that's what rustled for an hour.
love: I like %love% way more than I like you.
If there's one thing I want in life, it's %love%.
I'd almost give my firstborn for %love%. Almost.
Surely I'd be happier with %love%. That's how life works.
hate: I wish there weren't any %hate% in this world.
Hear me say, %hate% have ruined my life.
The worst thing in the world has to be %hate%.
The only thing worse than %hate% would be eating %hate%.
